archimate:BusinessInteraction.name: Organization
archimate:BusinessInteraction.documentation: A legal Entity that is not a natural person (i.e., not an Individual). Examples of Organizations include a Group, sole proprietorship, partnership, corporation, LLC, association, NGO, cooperative, government, etc. Mutually exclusive with Individual.
